# `useChangeEmail()`

Change email

```js
const { changeEmail, isLoading, needsEmailVerification, isError, error } =
  useChangeEmail()
```

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">options</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `RefOrValue<undefined | ChangeEmailOptions>`
